Backend Documentation¶

Wrappers¶

SurveyJob¶

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Billing : public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class is a wrapper for a list of BillingItems and LineItems.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations with the two internal lists. When any of the interface methods are called, each list is iterated and depending on the method called, the objects are inserted, updated, or deleted from the database.

The objects in each list also implement the IDatabaseWrapper class so they can also be inserted, updated, or deleted from the database easily.

Public Functions

List<BillingItem> GetBillingItems ()¶

Get a list of BillingItem objects associated with this Billing object.

Return

A list of BillingItems.

List<LineItem> GetLineItems ()¶

Get a list of LineItem objects associated with this Billing object.

Return

void SetObjects ()¶

Set this Billing object’s associated objects based on the ids in BillingIds and LineItemIds.

Get the billing item ids as a comma seperated list of ids.

Return

A comma seperated list of billing item ids.

Get the line item ids as a comma seperated list of ids.

Return

A comma seperated list of line item ids.

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.BillingItem : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single billing item for a survey job. A billing item has a field rate and time as well as an office rate and time.

There is also an associated date that corresponds to when the entry was created.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

void SetObjects ()¶

Set this billing item’s objects with those from the database based on the Ids. Each database operation runs on a seperate thread.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Define the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Define the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Define the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

int ID { get; set; }¶

The id representing this billing item in the database.

string Description { get; set; } = "N/A"¶

A description of this billing item.

Rate FieldRate { get; set; }¶

The Rate that should be associated with the Field time.

int FieldRateId { get; set; }¶

The id in the database of the FieldRate.

Rate OfficeRate { get; set; }¶

The Rate that should be associated with the Office time.

int OfficeRateId { get; set; }¶

The id in the database of the OfficeRate.

TimeSpan FieldTime { get; set; }¶

The time entry for this billing item’s field time. This is used in conjuction with the FieldRate to determine the field bill.

TimeSpan OfficeTime { get; set; }¶

The time entry for this billing item’s office time. This is used in conjuction with the OfficeRate to determine the office bill.

DateTime AssociatedDate { get; set; } = DateTime.Now¶

The date this entry was created.

bool IsValidItem { get; set; }¶

Checks the description, the field rate, and the office rate to ensure this is a valid billing item.

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.LineItem : public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single line item for a survey job. A line item is simply an extra charge to bill for on this survey.

Multiple line items can be added to a survey using the Billing class.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

LineItem (decimal amount, string description, double taxRate = 0.0)¶

Create a new line item with the necessary information.

Param amount

The amount for this charge.

Param description

A brief description of the charge.

Param taxRate

Any applicable tax that should be considered for this charge.

LineItem (int id, decimal amount, string description, double taxRate = 0.0)

Create a new line item with the necessary information.

Param id

The id of the row in the database.

Param amount

The amount for this charge.

Param description

A brief description of the charge.

Param taxRate

Any applicable tax that should be considered for this charge.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Define the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Define the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Define the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

int ID { get; set; }¶

The

decimal Amount { get; set; }¶

The amount in US dollars to charge for this line item.

string Description { get; set; }¶

A brief description about this charge.

double TaxRate { get; set; } = Settings.Default.DefaultTaxRate¶

Any applicable tax to add to the total for this line item.

decimal SubTotal { get; set; }¶

Get a value representing the subtotal for this line item. The subtotal is calculated using the Amount and the TaxRate.

bool IsValidLineItem { get; set; }¶

Get a value indicating if this is a valid billing line item.

A valid line item is one whose amount is not $0.00 and has a description.

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Rate : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

This class represents a single rate.

A rate is associated with a BillingItem and is used to determine how much to bill.

This class implements the IDatabaseWrapper interface to facilitate easier database operations.

Public Functions

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Define the behaviour for inserting the object’s data into the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Define the behaviour for updating the object’s data in the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Define the behaviour for deleting the object from the database.

Return

A DatabaseError enum representing the result of the method.

Properties

bool IsValidRate { get; set; }¶

Checks the description, amount, and county to ensure this is a valid rate.

class SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.SurveyJob.Survey : public ExpandableObjectConverter, public SurveyManager.backend.wrappers.IDatabaseWrapper¶

Public Functions

void SetObjects ()¶

Populates the objects for this survey with values from the database.

Gets the survey’s Client, County, Realtor, TitleCompany, and any files associated with it.

void AddFile (CFile file)¶

Add a new file to the associated file list.

Param file

The file to add.

void AddFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Adds the files to the associated file list if they are not already present.

Param files

The files to add.

void SetFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Overwrites the files list to be the specified files instead.

Param files

The files to set as the new Files list.

void RemoveFile (CFile file)¶

Remove a file, if it exists, from the associated file list.

Param file

The file to remove.

void RemoveFiles (ICollection<CFile> files)¶

Remove all files in files from Files.

Param files

The collection of files to remove.

void ClearFiles ()¶

Clear this survey’s associated files and file ids.

void AddFileId (int id)¶

Add a new file id to the id list.

Param id

The id to add.

void RemoveFileId (int id)¶

Remove a file id from the id list.

Param id

The id to remove.

bool ParseNotes (string notesString)¶

Parses a string containing notes and times into the appropiate dictionary in this class.

A note is specified by a dateTime in ticks (i.e., 637539336310000000) followed by a string; these two components are seperated by /**/

Param notesString

The string containing the notes and time information.

DatabaseError Insert ()¶

Handles insertion of this survey and any files associated with it.

Return

A DatabaseError with the result of the Insert operation.

DatabaseError Update ()¶

Handles updating this survey and any files associated with it as well. If there is a file with an ID of 0 (meaning it hasn’t been inserted yet), inserts it.

Return

A DatabaseError with the result of the Update operation.

DatabaseError Delete ()¶

Delete this survey from the database, along with the associated files and billing line items.

Return

A DatabaseError with the result of the Delete operation.

Properties

bool IsValidSurvey { get; set; }¶

Get a value that indicates if this is a valid Survey object.

A valid survey has a client, county, job number, and description at the very least.
